transcript: if you don't acknowledge that emotions weigh into all of your decisions even your quote rational ones you are lost if you're angry it's emotional if you're insecure that's emotional if you have emotions it decreases the speed with that you make decisions and mistakes love a rush decision the more you believe in it or the more you want the positive outcome to occur the more you will purposefully blind yourself because you want to save your ego and how you feel it makes you feel good to think about this positive outcome just why you see other people because you can be rational about others you see other people make these terrible decisions and you think to yourself why on God's Earth would they make those decisions when in reality that person is you and it's other people who are looking at you
